recipesJson.name: MlNikon's Apple Fritter
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: This is my interpretation of the Autumn pick for this week. Apple filling and Country Apple make the majority of the fritter with the sweet dough being the donut. Almond is there for a bit of separation. Flv caramel is more like a nice dark brown sugar giving the mix some base.
